summary.event: 7th International Workshop on Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems (FMAS 2025)
summary.scope: The workshop focuses on formal verification techniques for autonomous systems, including challenges such as dynamic environments, decision-making verification, and regulatory compliance.
topics_of_interest: Applicable, tool-supported Formal Methods for Autonomous Systems
Runtime Verification and reality gap issues
Case Studies on formal methods challenges
Experience Reports on practical application challenges
summary.best_paper_award: An award will be given for the best paper.
summary.special_issue: A journal special issue will be organized for extended versions of accepted papers.
summary.poster_session: A session for demos and posters will be co-located with iFM2025.

participation.in_person: Required registration and payment for on-site attendance.
